_source.text: 196 GALILEO IN FLORENCE [1617 " As Sister Arcangela's disposition/' she writes, "is very different from mine, being rather odd and whimsical, it is better for me to give up to her in many things, in order to preserve that peace and unity which accord with the exceeding love we bear each other."
